scripts.build-core: cd projects/rvn-core && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd.. && cd..
scripts.publish-core:patch: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version patch && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
scripts.publish-core:minor: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version minor && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
scripts.publish-core:major: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version major && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
scripts.publish-forms:patch: cd projects/rvn-forms && npm version patch && ng build rvn-forms --prod && cd ../../dist/rvn-forms && npm publish
scripts.publish-forms:minor: cd projects/rvn-forms && npm version minor && ng build rvn-forms --prod && cd ../../dist/rvn-forms && npm publish
scripts.publish-forms:major: cd projects/rvn-forms && npm version major && ng build rvn-forms --prod && cd ../../dist/rvn-forms && npm publish
scripts.docs: npm run docs-core && npm run docs-forms
